Creating a vibrant community through the Arts

Your community arts & events center  

 

 

Jan 8, 2026

Classic Rincon Exhibit Reception

Join us for the unveiling of the new exhibit, Classic Rincon, at the Lynda Fairly Carpinteria Arts Center in our Charles Lo Bue gallery on Saturday, January 17th, from 4:00 to 6:00 PM. Discover inspiring works, fresh perspectives, and creative expression in a welcoming gallery setting. All are welcome—come explore, connect, and enjoy the art.

Read More

Spring Classes & Workshoops

Spring 2026 Classes are now available for registration. Dive in and try something new!
